caption.p: ( a) Differential UV-Vis spectra of a poly-[NiSalen]-modified ITO-coated glass electrode in 0.05 M Et 4NBF 4/DCE in the potential range from −0.9 to 1.3 V, referenced to the spectrum of the polymer at −0.9 V; ( b) cyclic voltammogram (black curve 1) and conductance profile (red curve 2) of a poly-[NiSalen]-coated interdigitated electrode in 0.05 M Et 4NBF 4/DCE at a scan rate of 0.01 V s −1.
